DOC.criteria: Infertility indication IVF/ICSI Imminent POI , still cycle Age 25 39 year Two ovary Serum AMH measurement < 5 pmol/l ( two independent measurement ) Antral follicle count ( AFC ) ( sum ovary < 5 ) Ovarian pathology ( endometriosis , cyst ) Known chromosomal abnormality Known autoimmune disease ( except TPOantibodies ) Patients contraindication laparoscopy
